short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merge your follows from Kick on Twitch page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the Twitch user experience by merging Kick streaming data with the Twitch sidebar. It provides a seamless way to track online Kick streamers directly within the Twitch interface. The process involves fetching the follow list and online status from Kick, then dynamically updating the Twitch sidebar to reflect this information. The extension is designed with simplicity and user convenience in mind, activated through an intuitive pop-up interface.

However, due to current limitations, users must manually load their Kick follow list by clicking a button in the pop-up.
